response.message: Wow, congrats from a fellow North Carolinian! (Uh, okay, so I'm a New Zealander, but I've lived in NC for 1.5 years now.) :-)
Congrats Nick. (Shouldn't it be *2011* in first sentence instead of 2010?)
Sure Nick Craver is good fellow to have around on SO.
Congratulations, Nick.  I know you'll help make the StackOverflow site even better.
OMG! Jon Skeet has some competition :D
Congratulations Nick, awesome work!

Yay, now I'll have some odds of not getting my name half cut-off in the next screen shot :) 

Congratulations Nick, have fun.

Awesome job, Nick. Enjoy your new position! Many of us are jealous :-)

...I notice only one of the new team members was mentioned in this post!  ):
Nick has answered my questions or co-answered with me on other questions several times. Small world, I guess, or perhaps our tags just overlap. :P
wow nick craver is one of my favorite stackoverflowers!!congrats!!!
He topped Jon Skeet!? Unpossible!
Congrats, Nick!
In addition to Hans, this is good news for Jon Skeet.
Congrats, Nick! Now that cryptic comment you made the other day makes sense... Well done!
Congratulations, Nick!  Quitting WoW definitely explains the eccentric shape of your reputation graph.
"Nick Craver Facts" appears on Meta in 3... 2... 1...
Plain and simple, Nick is a bad ass. Congrats man! The SO community loves you.
Congrats, Nick!
Just saw the newest blog entry (http://blog.stackoverflow.com/2011/01/welcome-valued-associate-rebecca-chernoff/#comment-55814) and I take back my backwards smiley from earlier! (-:
Congratulations!
@Nick go on you mate. Like I say thanks a Trillion & Congrats
Almost all of Nicks answers have been, IMHO, poor quality. It's easy to get reputation on this site in that manner. This doesn't seem like a good decision, but it isn't in any way surprising.
So, Nick Craver is really a dog?  I kid, I kid.
Congratulations Nick. :)
75% of his answers are to duplicate questions...
I just read the blog post about recovering WoW-addiction. Great testimonial, very inspiring. Congratulations for keeping it real.
